review_title: Overworked underpaid micromanaged. Cares a lot about students. Good place if pay was better
pros: Lots of programs to help students succeed. Standard 8-5 workday, lots of holidays. Summer schedule flexibility. The staff and teachers are great.Most want to help.
cons: BloNo thinks its an easy school. Not enough money to hire good people. Hard for people to do their jobs as well as they could. Administration doesn't trust staff or teachers to do their jobs. Not a lot of full-time faculty.Technologically behind other institutions. Lots of paperwork and forms.
